rukus.text: Bal `Ajibu 'An Ja'ahum Mundhirun Minhum Faqala Al-Kafiruna Hadha Shay'un `Ajibun
A'idha Mitna Wa Kunna Turabaan Dhalika Raj`un Ba`idun
Qad `Alimna Ma Tanqusu Al-'Arđu Minhum Wa `Indana Kitabun Hafizun
Bal Kadhabu Bil-Haqqi Lamma Ja'ahum Fahum Fi 'Amrin Marijin
Afalam Yanzuru 'Ila As-Sama'i Fawqahum Kayfa Banaynaha Wa Zayyannaha Wa Ma Laha Min Furujin
Wa Al-'Arđa Madadnaha Wa 'Alqayna Fiha Rawasiya Wa 'Anbatna Fiha Min Kulli Zawjin Bahijin
Wa Nazzalna Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Mubarakaan Fa'anbatna Bihi Jannatin Wa Habba Al-Hasidi
Wa An-Nakhla Basiqatin Laha Tal`un Nađidun
Rizqaan Lil`ibadi Wa 'Ahyayna Bihi Baldatan Maytaan Kadhalika Al-Khuruju
Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa 'Ashabu Ar-Rassi Wa Thamudu
Wa 'Ashabu Al-'Aykati Wa Qawmu Tubba`in Kullun Kadhaba Ar-Rusula Fahaqqa Wa`idi
Afa`ayina Bil-Khalqi Al-'Awwali Bal Hum Fi Labsin Min Khalqin Jadidin
